attributes.action: Give EQUALITY to those who serve this country - especially the pre 1997 Gurkas and grant them British Citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition, basically because i couldnt find another one on here like it, is to grant complete British Citizenship to those Gurkhas who have served and defended our country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
